long_description: The REI Neck Wallet offers enough capacity for the documents, cards and currency needed to navigate the twists and turns of the travel environment in a small, lightweight package. Offers more organization than "under-clothing" neck security wallets. Interior organizer pockets manage travel documents, tickets, currency, passport, cards and coins. Zip design provides secure closure so valuables won't slip out unnoticed. REI Travel Neck Wallet has a simple, cord strap and low-profile handle for versatile carrying options. Stows very compactly for easy packing inside travel bag and luggage.
short_description: The REI Neck Wallet offers enough capacity for the documents, cards and currency needed to navigate the twists and turns of the travel environment in a small, lightweight package.
